prompts: Create a majestic Pokemon that embodies the moon and stars with shimmering wings.
Show me a powerful Legendary Pokemon with a celestial theme and dark blue feathers.
Design a ghostly creature with a mystical aura and large wings that reflect the night sky.
Imagine a Psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek, winged design and an ethereal glow.
Give me a mythical Pokemon that represents dreams, featuring vivid colors and elegant features.
Generate an otherworldly Pokemon with a unique body shape and celestial patterns on its wings.
Make a Legendary Pokemon that looks like it came from a distant galaxy, with striking colors.
